snippet: The emerging jazz duo of Peter Brötzmann and Jason Adasiewicz, now on tour, offered a set of improvisation at Le Poisson Rouge.
abstract: Ben Ratliff reviews performance by saxophonist Peter Brotzmann and vibraphonist Jason Adasiewicz at Le Poisson Rouge.
lead_paragraph: The emerging jazz duo of Peter Brötzmann and Jason Adasiewicz, now on tour, offered a set of improvisation at Le Poisson Rouge.

headline.seo: Peter Brötzmann and Jason Adasiewicz at Le Poisson Rouge
headline.main: Generations United for Improvisation, Refined but Violent
headline.print_headline: Generations United For Improvisation, Refined but Violent
